item.title: Blindfolded algorithm visualizer
item.description: This page allows you to search and view the algorithms I use to solve the Rubik’s cube blindfolded. This includes the classic 3x3, the 4x4 cube, and the 5x5 cube. Alg to visualize: Sheets alg: Full alg: Usage Guide Sticker Notation Since almost all blindfolded algorithms are denoted using pieces or stickers, we need to define sticker notation. All edges and corners are formed of multiple stickers, so for these types of pieces each sticker not only denotes a piece, but also the orientation of that piece.
